## Dataset


## High Level Goal

The goal of this project is to build a book recommendation system that suggests titles to users based on thier historical ratings/reviews and book metadata (author, genre, keywords).

## Plan of Attack

Week of Nov 3: Use peer review feedback to revise proposal and submit for instructor review

Week of Nov 10: Use intstructor feedback for a secondary revision of proposal

Week of Nov 17: Load and clean data, complete EDA

Week of Nov 24: Complete feature engineering & model building

Week of Dec 01: Refine model, tune hyperparameters, add evaluation metrics

Week of Dec 08: Finalize slides, polish everything up, and write report
